document_data.name: ''Mantle of the Holy Warrior''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mantle of the Holy Warrior''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[cloak]] that radiated strengthening aura.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of the mantle was granted the ability to cast the ''[[crusader's mantle]]'' [[spell]] once per day, allowing the caster to surrender themselves and all allies within {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} in an aura of holy power, granting all ally attacks additional radiant damage.
document_data.History: Sometime in the {{YearlinkName|1492}} or before, the ''Mantle of the Holy Warrior'' was found after falling into communal steambaths in [[Baldur's Gate]], during "All Saints Morning Retreat and Candlelit Guided Meditation." The mantle was left unclaimed and ended up in possession of the priests in the Gate's [[Stormshore Tabernacle]], available for purchase for devotees with enough [[coin]].
